definition: to have as its purpose/to be intended to/to aim to (do sth)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: They are currently in the process of piloting two programs aimed at getting families outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他们最近还在实施另两个旨在让家庭走向户外的项目。

sentences.english: The aim of this thesis is to compare and study the differences of phatic language between English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本论文旨在对比研究应酬语在英汉语中的区别。

sentences.english: The book aims at the social problem caused by drug-taking.
sentences.chinese: 这本书旨在讨论吸毒引起的社会问题。

sentences.english: The idea of an edit box, of course, is to allow users to type something in.
sentences.chinese: 编辑框旨在允许用户键入某些内容。

sentences.english: The site isdesigned to provide consumers with practical information on healthful eating.
sentences.chinese: 该网站旨在为消费者提供有关健康饮食的实用信息。

sentences.english: The Zebrafish DVD Exchange Project is aimed at by-passing these limitations.
sentences.chinese: 斑马鱼DVD交换计划旨在绕过这些限制。

sentences.english: This study aims on the spectral features and sensitive spectrum wave band in the apple florescence .
sentences.chinese: 旨在探索苹果花期的光谱特征和敏感波段。

sentences.english: This is to exercise your eye muscles and increase their flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法旨在锻炼眼肌，增强其灵活性。

sentences.english: Obedience is the aim of supporting parents. No why and no reason to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 养亲旨在顺意，不问为什么，也不能讲什么大道理。

sentences.english: This study was aimed to establish a mouse bioassay for ciguatoxin detection.
sentences.chinese: 旨在建立西加毒素小鼠生物学检测法。

sentences.english: 1To define the requirements and procedures of surface resistivity test.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在定义表面电阻测量的要求和步骤。

sentences.english: This dissertation is to develop a late-model sewer system named vacuum sewer system.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在开发一套新型真空下水道系统。

sentences.english: Are there any policies that are intended to improve the life of the poor?
sentences.chinese: 有什么旨在改善穷人生活的政策吗？

sentences.english: The VME bus data collecting system is studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本论文旨在研究VME总线数据采集系统。

sentences.english: It also aims to reduce risk and improve visibility into business operations.
sentences.chinese: 它还旨在降低风险和提高对业务操作的可见性。

sentences.english: Alternately, new international agreements will surface that attempt curb leaking and punish leakers.
sentences.chinese: 旨在控制泄密和惩罚泄密者的新国际协议也会出现。

definition: to work for/to devote one's efforts to
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
to try hard to/to strive to
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
